article_title: 295,000 surgical masks from U.S. 'on hold' because of Trump order
article_description: A shipment of 295 000 surgical masks New Brunswick was expecting from the United States is now  on hold  after President Donald Trump ordered manufacturer 3M to stop exporting N95 respirators to Canada  says Premier Blaine Higgs
article_content: A shipment of 295 000 surgical masks New Brunswick was expecting from the United States is now  on hold  after President Donald Trump ordered manufacturer 3M to stop exporting N95 respirators to Canada  says Premier Blaine Higgs But it hasn t been cancelled   2547 chars
